metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31566 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
symbolic links incorrectly followed when changing modes, times, ACL and flags of a file while extracting an archive

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-31566` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libarchive-tools - 3.4.3-2ubuntu0.1
libarchive13 - 3.4.3-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.3-2ubuntu0.1').
